translations: 尤克里里琴（夏威夷的四弦琴，等于 ukelele）

sentences.sentence: The hulk of an ancient wreck burned with blue fires, in the light of which danced the HULA dancers to the barbaric love-calls of the singers, who chanted to tinkling UKULELES and rumbling tom-toms.
sentences.translation: 火光里人们跳着呼啦舞。 为他们奏乐的歌手们弹奏着叮叮当当的尤克里里琴，擂着轰隆作响的大鼓，高唱着野蛮的爱情歌曲。
